alert.note: Alert for Fleming; Rowan (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 06 at 2:09PM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Fleming and northwestern Rowan Counties through 245 PM EDT... At 209 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Plummers Landing, or 8 miles northwest of Morehead, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Munson around 220 PM EDT. Waltz, Cranston and Hays Crossing around 225 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Triplett and Gates. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Heavy rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
